overview: A graduate of the Manchester United ‘Class of ‘92’, Paul Scholes is one of the most decorated players in Premier League history. With 11 top-flight titles, 3 F.A. Cups and 2 Champions League winners medals to his name, his has rightly been inducted into the Premier League Hall of Fame. We sit down with the Englishman and those who played alongside him to talk through his incredible career.
title: Premier League Stories - Paul Scholes
